juzs.text: 18|75|Xizr guft: «Ba tu naguftam, ki hargiz nametavoni ʙo man sikeʙoi kuni?»
18|76|Muso guft: «Agar az in pas cize az tu pursidam, digar ʙo man hamrohi nakun va az coniʙi man, hatman, ma'zur xohi ʙud»

18|77|Pas, ʙa roh aftodand, to ʙa ahli sahre rasidand [va] az onon ƣizo xostand; [ammo onon] az mehmon kardani eson xuddori kardand. Sipas dar on co devore joftand, ki mexost furu ʙirezad va [Xizr] onro rostu ustuvor kard. [Muso] Guft: «Agar mexosti, [metavonisti] ʙaroi on [kor az onon] muzde ʙigiri»
18|78|[Xizr] Guft: «In ki zamoni cudoii manu tu faro rasidaast. Ba zudi turo az tavzeh [va daleli] on ci ki natavonisti dar ʙaroʙaras sikeʙoi kuni, ogoh xoham soxt
18|79|Ammo on kisti az oni ʙenavojone ʙud, ki dar darjo kor mekardand; pas, xostam ma'juʙas kunam; [zero] pesi rohason [dar darjo] podsohe [sitamgor] ʙud, ki har kistii [solime]-ro ʙa zur megirift
18|80|Va ammo on navcavon padaru modaras mu'min ʙudand; pas, tarsidem, ki on duro ʙa sarkasi va kufr vo dorad
18|81|Az in ru, xostem, ki Parvardigorason ʙa coji u [farzandi] poktaru mehruʙontare ʙa onho ato farmojad

18|82|Va ammo on devor ʙaroi ʙa du pisarʙacai jatim dar on sahr ʙud va zeri on gance ʙud, ki ʙa on du taalluq dost va padarason [niz] marde durustkor ʙud; pas, Parvardigorat xost, ki onon ʙa haddi ʙuluƣ ʙirasand va ganci xesro [az zeri on devor] ʙerun ovarand. In rahmate az coniʙi Parvardigori tu ʙud va man in [korho]-ro xudsarona nakardam, in ʙud tavzeh [va daleli] korhoe, ki natavonisti dar ʙaroʙaras sikeʙoi kuni»
18|83|Va [ej pajomʙar, musrikonu jahudijon] dar ʙorai «Zu-l-qarnajn» az tu mepursand; ʙigu: «Ba zudi cize az sarguzasti u ʙarojaton xoham xond»
18|84|Mo dar zamin ʙa u qudratu hukumat dodem va vasilai [rasidan ʙa] har cizero dar ixtijoras nihodem
18|85|Pas, u [az in] vasoil [ʙaroi rasidan ʙa ahdofas] istifoda kard

18|86|[Ruze dar zamin ʙa roh aftod] To ʙa mahalli ƣuruʙi xursed rasid. [Cunin ʙa nazaras rasid] Ki xursed dar casmae garm va gilolud ƣuruʙ mekunad va dar [nazdikii on co qavme [kofir]] joft. [Ba u] Guftem: «Ej Zu-l-qarnajn, jo [ononro] mucozot mekuni jo dar mijonason [raftori] nakue pes megiri»
18|87|[Zu-l-qarnajn] Guft: «Ammo kasero, ki sitam karda [va sirk varzida] ast, mucozot xohem kard, sipas ʙa suji Parvardigoras ʙozgardonida mesavad, on goh uro ʙa azoʙe ʙisjor saxt mucozot xohad kard
18|88|Va ammo kase, ki imon ovarad va kori soista ancom dihad, pas, [dar oxirat] nakutarin podos [ʙihist]-ro xohad dost va ʙo muloimat [va mehruʙoni] ʙo vaj suxan xohem guft»
18|89|Sipas [Zu-l-qarnajn] az vasoili [xud] istifoda kard [va ʙa suji masriq raft]

18|90|To on ki ʙa cojgohi ʙaromadani xursed rasid. [Dar on co xursedro] Did, ki ʙar mardumone tulu' mekunad, ki dar ʙaroʙari on [nuru garmoi oftoʙ] ʙarojason pusise qaror nadoda ʙudem [na sarpanohe na sojai daraxte]
18|91|[Kori Zu-l-qarnajn] Incunin, ʙud va Mo ʙa on ci u dar ixtijor dost [va ancom medod], komilan ogoh ʙudem
18|92|Sipas [Zu-l-qarnajn] az imkonot [-i xud] istifoda kard [va ʙa coje ʙajni sarqu ƣarʙ raft]
18|93|[U hamcunon raft] To ʙa [darae] mijoni du kuh rasid va dar kanori on du [kuh] mardumero joft, ki suxane [ʙa cuz zaʙoni xudro] namefahmidand
18|94|[Onon] Guftand: «Ej Zu-l-qarnajn, Ja'cucu Ma'cuc dar in sarzamin [taʙahkori va] fasod mekunand. Pas, ojo [mumkin ast] xarce dar ixtijor qaror dihem, to mijoni mo va onon sadde ʙisozi?»

18|95|U guft: «On ci [az qudratu sarvat] ki Parvardigoram dar on ʙa man tavonoi dodaast [az on ci arza mekuned], ʙehtar ast; pas, maro ʙo neru [-i insoni] jori kuned, [to] mijoni sumo va onon sadde muhkami ustuvor sozem

18|96|Hatman, qit'ahoi ohan ʙarojam ʙijovared [va ruji ham ʙicined]», to vaqte komilan mijoni du kuhro ʙaroʙar soxt [va pusond. Sipas] guft: «[Dar atrofi devorai ohanin otas ʙijafruzed va] dar on ʙidamed». [Onon cunin kardand] To vaqte on [qitaoti ohan]-ro gudoxta kard; [sipas] guft: «[Aknun] misi oʙsuda ʙarojam ʙijovared, to ruji on [devor] ʙirezam»
18|97|Pas, [Ja'cucu Ma'cuc] digar natavonistand az on ʙolo ravand va [hatto] natavonistand suroxe dar on ecod kunand

18|98|[On goh Zu-l-qarnajn] Guft: «In [sad] az rahmati Parvardigori man ast [va to Alloh taolo ʙixohad, ʙoqi memonad]; ammo hangome ki va'dai Parvardigoram faro rasad, onro darham mekuʙad va va'dai Parvardigoram haq ast»
18|99|Va dar on ruz [ki cahon pojon mepazirad] ononro [cunon] raho mekunem, ki [az farovonii cam'ijat] dar ham meomezand va [hamin, ki] dar sur damida sud, hamaro [dar jak co] cam' mekunem
18|100|Va on ruz duzaxro oskoro ʙar kofiron arza medorem
18|101|[Hamon] Kasone, ki casmonason az jodi man dar parda [-i ƣaflat] ʙud va tavoni sunidan [-i ojoti ilohiro] nadostand
18|102|Ojo kasone, ki kufr varzidand, pindostaand, ki [metavonand] ʙa coji man ʙandagonamro korsoz [va dusti xud] ʙigirand? Be tardid, Mo duzaxro ʙaroi kofiron cojgohi paziroi soxtaem
18|103|[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «[Mexohed] Sumoro az zijonkortarin [mardum] dar korho ogoh sozam
18|104|Kasone, ki talosason dar zindagii dunjo taʙoh gastaast va xud mepindorad, ki kori naku mekunand»
18|105|Onon kasone hastand, ki ʙa ojoti Parvardigorason va didori U [dar oxirat] kofir sudand; pas, korhojason taʙoh gast va ruzi qijomat ʙarojason [hec qadru] arzise qoil namesavem
18|106|Incunin ast, ki ʙa xotiri kufre, ki varzidaand va ojotu pajomʙaroni Maro ʙa tamasxur giriftaand podosason duzax ast
18|107|Be tardid, kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoe soista ancom dodaand, ʙoƣhoi [ʙihisti] ʙarin manzilgohason xohad ʙud
18|108|Covidona dar on xohand mond va hargiz az on co ʙa coji digare garois nadorand

18|109|[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «Agar darjo ʙaroi [nigorisi] kalimoti Parvardigoram rang savad, pes az on ki kalimoti Parvardigoram pojon joʙad, hatman, darjo ʙa pojon merasad; harcand [darjohoe digar] hammonandi on [darjoro niz] ʙa kumak ʙijovarem»

18|110|[Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «Man faqat ʙasare [odi] hamcun sumo hastam. Ba man vahj mesavad, ki tanho ma'ʙudaton Alloh taolo jaktost; pas, har ki ʙa didori Parvardigoras [dar oxirat] umed dorad, ʙojad kori soista ancom dihad va hec kasro dar parastisi Parvardigoras sarik nasozad»
19|1|Kof, ho, jo, 'ajn, sod
19|2|[In] Bajoni rahmati Parvardigorat [nisʙat] ʙa ʙandaas Zakarijost
19|3|On goh ki Parvardigorasro ʙa nidoe pinhon [ʙa duo] xond
19|4|Guft: «Parvardigoro, ʙa rosti, ki ustuxonam sust suda va mujhojam az piri saped gasta va ej Parvardigoram, [hargiz] dar duoi tu [az icoʙat] ʙeʙahra naʙudaam
19|5|Va man pas az [margi] xud az xesovandonam [nisʙat ʙa hifzi dini Tu] ʙimnokam va hamsaram [niz] nozost; pas, ʙa lutfi xes farzande ʙa man ato farmo
19|6|[Pisare, ki] Vorisi manu vorisi xonadoni Ja'quʙ ʙosad; va Parvardigoro, uro [dar ilmu din insone] pisandida gardon»
19|7|[Alloh taolo duojasro icoʙat kardu farmud] «Ej Zakarijo, Mo turo ʙa [tavalludi] pisare ʙasorat medihem, ki nomas Jahjo ast [va] pes az in hamnome ʙarojas qaror nadodaem»
19|8|[Zakarijo] Guft: «Parvardigoro, ci guna pisare xoham dost, dar hole ki hamsaram nozost va man [niz] az siddati piri ʙa notavoni rasidaam?»
19|9|[Farista] Guft: «In guna ast [ki tu megui, vale] Parvardigorat farmudaast: «In [amr] ʙaroi Man oson ast va ʙa rosti, pes az in [niz] turo ofaridem, dar hole ki cize naʙudi»

19|10|[Zakarijo] Guft: «Parvardigoro, ʙaroi man nisonae [ʙar tahaqquqi in ʙasorat] qaror ʙideh». [Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Nisonai tu in ast, ki ce saʙona [ruz] dar hole ki solim [va tandurust] hasti, ʙo mardum suxan namegui»
19|11|Pas, u az mehroʙ [ cojgohi iʙodatas] ʙa suji qavmas raft va ʙa onon isora kard, ki: «ʙomdodu somgoh [Parvardigorro] ʙa poki jod kuned»
19|12|[Alloh taolo farmud] «Ej Jahjo, kitoʙi [Tavrot]-ro ʙo quvvat [va ciddijat] ʙigir» va dar kudaki ʙa u donis [va hikmat] dodem
19|13|Va az coniʙi xes [ʙa u] muhaʙʙatu poki [az gunohon ato kardem] va u parhezkor ʙud
19|14|Va nisʙat ʙa padaru modaras nakukor ʙud va sarkas [-u] nofarmon naʙud
19|15|Va salom [va amnijati Alloh taolo] ʙar u ʙod, ruze, ki mutavallid sud va ruze, ki memirad va ruze, ki zinda ʙarangexta mesavad
19|16|Va dar [in] kitoʙ [Qur'on] az Marjam jod kun, on goh ki az xonavodaas kanora girift [va dar] nohijai sarqi [az onon] mustaqar sud
19|17|Va mijoni xud va onho pardae afkand [to xilvatgohi iʙodatas ʙosad]. On goh [mo] Ruhi xud [Caʙrail]-ro ʙa sujas firistodem va ʙa sakli insone xusandom ʙar vaj namojon gast
19|18|[Marjam] Guft: «Man az [sarri] tu ʙa [Allohi] Rahmon panoh meʙaram. Agar parhezkori [ʙa man oseʙ narason]»
19|19|[Caʙrail] guft: «Jaqinan, man firistodai Parvardigorat hastam, to ʙa tu pisari pokizae ʙaxsam»
19|20|[Marjam] guft: «Ci guna mumkin ast pisare dosta ʙosam; hol on ki dasti hec insone ʙa man narasidaast va ʙadkor [niz] naʙudaam?»

19|21|[Caʙrail] Guft: «[Dastur] cunin ast. Parvardigorat farmud: «In [kor] ʙar man oson ast va uro ʙaroi mardum nisonae [az qudrati xes] qaror medihem va [niz] rahmate az suji Most; va in [sevai tavallud] amre ancomjofta [va hatmi] ast»
19|22|Pas, [Marjam] ʙa u ʙordor sud. Va ʙo u ʙa coje durdast [raft va az mardum] kanora girift
19|23|Pas, dardi zojmon uro ʙa samti jak tanai naxl kasond [va u dar hole ki dard mekasid] guft: «Ej kos, pes az in memurdam va ʙa kulli az jodho meraftam [to kase dar ʙoraam xajoli ʙotil nakunad]»
19|24|Nogahon az zeri [poji] u [Iso] nidojas dod, ki: «Ƣamgin maʙos. Parvardigorat zeri [poji] tu casmai oʙe ravon soxtaast
19|25|Va tanai naxlro ʙa tarafi xud takon ʙideh, [to] rutaʙi toza ʙar tu furu rezad

19|26|Pas, [az on xurmo] ʙixur va [az oʙi casma] ʙinus va didagonro [ʙa in farzand] ravsan dor; va agar har jak az mardumro didi, [ʙo isora] ʙigu: «Man ʙaroi [Allohi] Rahmon ruzai [cukut] nazr kardam va imruz ʙo hec insone suxan naxoham guft»
19|27|Pas, [Marjam] dar hole ki u [Iso]-ro ʙardosta ʙud, nazdi qavmas omad. Onon guftand: «Ej Marjam, ʙa rosti, duruƣi ʙuzurge megui [ki navzod ʙiduni padar mutavallid sudaast]
19|28|Ej xohari Horun, na padarat mardi ʙadkore ʙud va na modarat [zani] ʙadkorae»
19|29|Pas, Marjam ʙa u [Iso] isora kard. Onon guftand: «Ci guna ʙo kudake dar gahvora suxan ʙiguem?»
19|30|[Iso ʙa suxan omad va] guft: «Man ʙandai Alloh taolo hastam. U ʙa man kitoʙ doda va maro pajomʙar soxtaast
19|31|Va maro – har co ki ʙosam – purʙarakat namuda va to zinda hastam, ʙa namozu zakot suporisam kardaast
19|32|Va nisʙat ʙa modaram nakukor [gardonida] va maro [dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigoram] sarkas [-u] nofarmon qaror nadodaast
19|33|Va salom ʙar man ruze, ki mutavallid sudam va ruze, ki memiram va ruze, ki zinda ʙarangexta mesavam»
19|34|In ast [hikojati] Iso pisari Marjam; [hamon] guftori roste, ki [gumrohon] dar ʙoraas tardid [va ixtilof] mekunand

19|35|[Hargiz] Sazovor nest, ki Alloh taolo [ʙaroi xes] farzande ʙigirad. U [poku] munazzah ast. [Alloh taolo] Har goh korero iroda kunad, faqat ʙa on megujad: «Mavcud sav»; pas [ʙedirang] mavcud mesavad
19|36|Va [Iso ʙa qavmas guft] «Be tardid, Alloh taolo Parvardigori man va sumost; pas, uro parasted [ki] rohi rost in ast»
19|37|On goh guruhho [-i muxtalifi qavmas] dar mijoni xud ducori ixtilof sudand. Pas, voj ʙar onho, ki kufr varzidand az musohidai ruzi ʙuzurg [qijomat]
19|38|On ruz, ki nazdi mo meojand, ci [xuʙ] sunavo va ʙino hastand! Ammo imruz [dar zindagii dunjo] sitamgoron dar gumrohii oskorand
19|39|Va [ej pajomʙar] ʙa onon dar ʙorai ruzi [pusajmoni va] hasrat husdor ʙideh; on goh ki kori [dovari] ancom megirad; va [imruz] onon dar ƣaflatand va imon nameovarand
19|40|Jaqinan, Mo zamin va har kiro ʙar on ast, ʙa irs meʙarem va [hama] ʙa suji Mo ʙozgardonida savand
19|41|Va [ej pajomʙar] dar in kitoʙ az Iʙrohim jod kun. Be tardid, u pajomʙare rostgu ʙud
19|42|Hangome ki ʙa padaras [Ozar] guft: «Padarcon, caro cizero parastis mekuni, ki na [duojatro] mesunavad va na [iʙodatatro] meʙinad va na gazandero az tu dur mesozad
19|43|Padarcon, jaqinan, az donisi [vahj] cize ʙa man rasidaast, ki [hargiz] ʙa tu narasidaast; pas, az man pajravi kun, to ʙa rohe rost hidojat kunam
19|44|Padarcon, az sajton pajravi nakun, [caro ki] ʙe tardid, sajton nisʙat ʙa [Allohi] Rahmon nofarmon ʙud
19|45|Padarcon, man metarsam, ki az [coniʙi Allohi] Rahmon azoʙe ʙa tu rasad va [dar duzax] az duston [va hamnisinoni] sajton ʙosi»
19|46|[Ozar] Guft: «Ej Iʙrohim, ojo az ma'ʙudhoi man rujgardoni? Agar [az aqidaat] dast ʙarnadori, hatman, sangsorat mekunam; [ʙirav] va muddati zijode az man dur sav»
19|47|[Iʙrohim] Guft: «Salom [va amnijat az coniʙi man] ʙar tu. Ba zudi az Parvardigoram ʙarojat omurzis xoham xost. Be tardid, u nisʙat ʙa man ʙisjor mehruʙon ast
19|48|Va az sumo [kofiron] va on ci ʙa coji Alloh taolo mexoned, kanoragiri mekunam va Parvardigoramro mexonam. Umed ast, ki dar xondani Parvardigoram [az icoʙat] ʙeʙahra naʙosam»
19|49|Pas, cun az onon va on ci ʙa coji Alloh taolo meparastidand, kanoragiri kard, Ishoq va Ja'quʙro ʙa u ʙaxsidem va hamai [onon]-ro pajomʙar namudem
19|50|Va esonro az rahmati xes ʙahramand soxtem va ʙarojason [dar mijoni mardum ovozai ʙaland va] nomi naku nihodem
19|51|Va dar in kitoʙ az Muso jod kun. Be tardid, u [ʙarguzidae] muxlis va firistodavu pajomʙar ʙud
19|52|Va [mo] uro az samti rosti [kuhi] Tur nido dodem va munocotkunon [ʙa xes] nazdikas soxtem
19|53|Va az rahmati xud ʙarodaras Horunro – ki, pajomʙar [va jovari u] ʙud – va ʙa vaj ato kardem
19|54|Va dar in kitoʙ az Ismoil jod kun. Be tardid, u rostva'da va firistodavu pajomʙar ʙud
19|55|Va [hamvora] xonavodaasro ʙa namozu zakot farmon medod va nazdi Parvardigoras pisandida ʙud
19|56|Va dar in kitoʙ az Idris jod kun. Be tardid, u rostguftoru pajomʙare ʙud
19|57|Va [mo] uro ʙa maqome ʙaland ʙarkasidem

19|58|Inon kasone az pajomʙaron hastand, ki Alloh taolo ʙar eson ne'mat [hidojat] dod; [afrode] az farzandoni Odam va az kasone, ki hamrohi Nuh [ʙar kisti] savor kardem va az farzandoni Iʙrohim va Ja'quʙ va az [cumla] afrode, ki hidojat kardem va ʙarguzidem [va] har goh ojoti [Parvardigori] Rahmon ʙar eson xonda mesud, sacdakunon va girjon ʙa xok meaftodand

19|59|On goh pas az onon conisinone gumroh va nosoista omadand, ki namozro taʙoh soxtand [dar on sahlangori namudand] va az havasho [va sahavot] pajravi kardand; va ʙa zudi [kajfari] gumrohii [xes]-ro xohand did
19|60|Magar kase, ki tavʙa namud va imon ovard va kore soista kard. Pas, inon ʙa ʙihist doxil mesavand va ʙar onon hec sitame nameravad
19|61|Boƣhoe covidon, ki [Allohi] Rahmon az [olam] nopajdo ʙa ʙandagonas va'da dodaast. Jaqinan, va'dai u omadani ast
19|62|Dar on co suxani ʙehudae namesunavad [va guftorason] cuz salom [u tahijat nest]; va dar on co ʙar eson [har] suʙhu som ruzi [ʙehisoʙ faroham] ast
19|63|In hamon ʙihiste ast, ki ʙa har kas az ʙandagonamon, ki [dar dunjo] parhezkor ʙosad, ʙa meros medihem
19|64|Va [ej Caʙrail, ʙa Muhammad ʙigu] «Mo cuz ʙa farmoni Parvardigorat furud nameoem. U hokim ʙar ojanda va guzasta va holi most; va Parvardigorat faromuskor nest
19|65|[Hamon] Parvardigori osmonho va zamin va on ci mijoni onhost; pas, uro parastis kun va ʙar iʙodatas sikeʙo [va pojdor] ʙos. Ojo [hammonand va] hamnome ʙarojas mesinosi?»
19|66|Va insoni [kofir] megujad: «Ojo hangome ki ʙimiram, ʙa rosti, maro zinda [az gur] ʙerun xohand ovard?»
19|67|Ojo inson ʙa jod nameovarad, ki mo pes az in uro ofaridem, dar hole ki hec naʙud
19|68|Pas, savgand ʙa Parvardigorat, ki jaqinan, onon [munkironi qijomat]-ro ʙo sajotin mahsur xohem kard; sipas hamaro ʙa zonu darovarda girdogirdi duzax hozir mekunem
19|69|Sipas az har guruhe kasonero dar ʙaroʙari [farmoni Allohi] Rahmon sarkastar ʙudaand, ʙerun mekasem
19|70|On goh, jaqinan, Mo ʙa [holi] kasone, ki ʙaroi [daraftodan ʙa] on [otasi dahsatnok] sazovortarand, donotarem
19|71|Va hec jak az sumo [mardum] nest, magar on ki voridi on megardad; [mu'minon ʙaroi uʙur va didan, kofiron ʙaroi vurud va mondan]. In [amr] hamvora ʙar Parvardigorat qazoi hatmi ast
19|72|Sipas kasonero, ki parhezkori kardaand, [az otas] nacot medihem va zolimonro ʙa zonu daromada, dar on raho mekunem
19|73|Va hangome ki ojoti ravsani Mo ʙar onon tilovat mesavad, kasone, ki kufr varzidaand, ʙa afrode, ki imon ovardaand, megujand: «Kadom jak az [mo] du guruh cojgohe ʙehtaru maclise nakutar dorad?»
19|74|Ci ʙisjor naslhoro pes az onon noʙud kardem, ki sarvate ʙestar va zohire orostatar dostand

19|75|[Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «Har ki dar gumrohi ast, [Allohi] Rahmon ʙa u muhlat medihad [to gumrohias ʙestar savad] to zamone, ki va'dai ilohiro [ʙa casmi xud] ʙuʙinand: jo azoʙi [dunjo] jo [kajfari] qijomat. Pas, ʙa zudi xohand donist, ki ci kase cojgohas ʙadtar va sipohas notavontar ast»
19|76|Va [ammo] kasone, ki roh joftaand, Alloh taolo ʙar hidojatason meafzojad; va nekihoi pojdor [raftoru guftori soista] dar pesgohi Parvardigorat podose ʙehtar va sarancome nakutar dorad
19|77|Ojo didi on kasero, ki ʙa ojoti Mo kofir sud va guft: «Hatman, molu farzand [-i farovone dar oxirat] ʙa man doda xohad sud?»
19|78|Ojo u ʙar ƣajʙ ogohi joftaast, jo az [Allohi] Rahmon pajmone giriftaast
19|79|[Hargiz] Cunin nest; guftaasro menavisem va ʙar azoʙas meafzoem
19|80|Va on ci [az amvolu farzandon], ki megujad, az u ʙa irs meʙarem va [ruzi qijomat tihidast va] tanho nazdi mo meojad
19|81|Va [musrikon] ʙa coji Alloh taolo ma'ʙudone ʙarguzidaand, to [jovaru] pustiʙonason ʙosad
19|82|Cunin nest; [ʙalki on ma'ʙudho dar qijomat] iʙodati ononro inkor xohand kard va dusmanason xohand ʙud
19|83|[Ej pajomʙar] Ojo nadidi, ki Mo sajotinro ʙar kofiron firistodem, to ononro [ʙo vasvasahoi xud] tahrik kunand [va az rohi Alloh taolo ʙozdorand]
19|84|Pas, dar ʙorai [noʙudii] onon sitoʙ nakun. Cuz in nest, ki Mo [ruzhoi marg va faro rasidani azoʙro] ʙa diqqat ʙarojason mesumorem
19|85|[Jod kun az] Ruze, ki parhezkoronro [ʙo izzatu ehtirom] ʙa mehmonii [Allohi] Rahmon gird meovarem
19|86|Va mucrimonro tasnakom ʙa suji cahannam meronem
19|87|Onon hargiz [tavoni] safoat nadorand; magar kase, ki [ʙo imon va amali soistaas] az [Allohi] Rahmon pajmone girifta ʙosad
19|88|Va [musrikon] guftand: «[Allohi] Rahmon farzande [ʙaroi xes] ʙarguzidaast»
19|89|Ba rosti, [ʙo in iddao] cize ʙisjor zist [ʙa mijon] ovarded
19|90|Az in [suxani kufromez] nazdik ast osmonho az ham ʙiposad va zamin ʙiskofad va kuhho dar ham ʙiskanand va furu rezand
19|91|[Caro] Ki ʙaroi [Allohi] Rahmon farzande iddao kardaand
19|92|Va hargiz sazovori [Allohi] Rahmon nest, ki farzande ʙarguzinad
19|93|Dar osmonho va zamin hec kase nest, magar on ki [dar ruzi qijomat xoksor va] ʙandavor nazdi Allohi Rahmon meojad
19|94|Jaqinan, [Alloh taolo hamai] ononro dar sumor ovarda va durust ʙarsumurdaast
19|95|Va hamagiason ruzi qijomat tanho [va tihidast] nazdi U hozir mesavand
19|96|Kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, jaqinan, [Allohi] Rahmon [dar dilhoi ʙandagonas] ʙarojason muhaʙʙate xohad nihod
19|97|[Ej pajomʙar] Be tardid, Mo in [Qur'on]-ro ʙar zaʙoni tu oson namudem, to parhezkoronro ʙo on ʙasorat dihi va sitezagaron [-i sarsaxt]-ro ʙim dihi
19|98|Va ci ʙisjor naslhoi guzastaro pes az onon noʙud kardem. Ojo [vucudi] hec jak az ononro ehsos mekuni jo kamtarin sadoe az onon mesunavi
20|1|To, ho
20|2|[Ej pajomʙar, mo] Qur'onro ʙar tu nozil nakardem, to dar ranc ʙijafti
20|3|[Onro nafiristodem] Magar on ki pande ʙosad, ʙaroi har ki [az azoʙi ilohi] metarsad
20|4|[In Qur'on] Furufiristodae ast az coniʙi on ki zaminu osmonhoi ʙalandro ofaridaast
20|5|[Parvardigori] Rahmon [onguna ki soistai U ast va ʙiduni on ki muhtoc ʙa Ars ʙosad] ʙar Ars qaror girift
20|6|On ci dar osmonho va zamin va on ci mijoni onhost va on ci zeri xok [pinhon] ast, [hamagi] az oni Ust
20|7|Va agar suxan oskor ʙigui [jo onro pinhon dori], jaqinan, U [rozi] nihon va [hatto] nihontar [az on]-ro niz medonad
20|8|Alloh taolo ast, ki hec ma'ʙude [ʙar haq] cuz U nest [va] nakutarin nomho az oni Ust
20|9|[Ej pajomʙar] Ojo xaʙari Muso ʙa tu rasidaast
20|10|On goh ki otasero [az dur] didu ʙa xonavodaas guft: «[Lahzae] Dirang kuned [ki] man otase didaam. Sojad su'lae az on ʙarojaton ʙijovaram jo kanori on otas rohnamoe ʙijoʙam»
20|11|Pas, cun nazdi on [otas] omad, nido doda sud, ki: «Ej Muso
20|12|Ba rosti, man Parvardigorat hastam; pas, [ʙaroi munocot ʙo Parvardigor] kafshojatro darovar [ki] dar haqiqat, tu dar sarzamini muqaddasi «Tuvo» hasti
20|13|Va man turo [ʙa pajomʙari] ʙarguzidam; pas, ʙa on ci vahj mesavad, gus faro dor
20|14|Be tardid, manam «Alloh taolo», ki hec ma'ʙude [ʙar haqqe] cuz man nest; pas, maro ʙiparast va ʙaroi jodi man namoz ʙar po dor
20|15|Jaqinan, qijomat omadani ast; [vale] mexoham [vaqti] onro pinhon doram, to ʙa har kase dar ʙaroʙari [kor va] talose, ki mekunad, podos doda savad
20|16|Pas, maʙodo kase, ki ʙa on imon nadorad va az havashojas pajravi mekunad, turo az [nakukori va omodagi ʙaroi] on ʙozdorad, ki halok mesavi
20|17|Va, ej Muso, on cist ʙa [dasti] rostat?»
20|18|U guft: «In asoi man ast; ʙar on takja mekunam va ʙo on ʙaroi gusfandonam [ʙargi daraxtonro] furu merezam va ʙo on korhoi digare [niz] doram [ki ʙarovarda mekunam]
20|19|[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Ej Muso, onro ʙijafkan»
20|20|Pas, [Muso] onro [ʙar zamin] afkand va nogahon [taʙdil ʙa] more sud, ki ʙa sur'at mexazid
20|21|[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Onro ʙigir va natars. Ba zudi onro ʙa sakli avvalas ʙozmegardonem
20|22|Va dastro dar ʙaƣal kun, to ʙiduni hec gazande [ʙa unvoni] mu'cizae digar safed [-u duraxson] ʙerun ojad
20|23|[Hadaf az iroai du mu'ciza in ʙud], ki ʙarxe az nisonahoi ʙuzurgi xesro nisonat dihem
20|24|[Inak] Ba suji Fir'avn ʙirav [ki] ʙe tardid, [kufr varzida va] sarkasi kardaast»
20|25|[Muso] Guft: «Parvardigoro, ʙar [havsala va] sikeʙoijam ʙijafzo
20|26|Va koramro ʙarojam oson gardon
20|27|Va gireh az zaʙonam ʙoz kun
20|28|To suxanamro darjoʙand
20|29|Va ʙaroi man jovare az [afrodi] xonadonam qaror ʙideh
20|30|Horun-ʙarodaramro
20|31|Pustamro ʙo u ustuvor soz
20|32|Va uro dar kori [risolati] man sarik kun
20|33|Turo ʙisjor ʙa poki ʙisitoem
20|34|va ʙisjor jodat kunem
20|35|Be tardid, Tu ʙa [holi] mo ʙinoi»
20|36|[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Ej Muso, xostaat ʙa tu doda sud
20|37|Dar haqiqat, mo [pestar] jak ʙori digar [niz] ʙar tu minnat nihoda ʙudem
20|38|On goh ki on ciro, ki [ʙojad dar ʙorai hifozat az tu] ilhom mesud, ʙa modarat ilhom kardem

20|39|Ki: «uro dar sanduqe ʙigzor va on [sanduq]-ro ʙa darjo [rudi Nil] ʙijandoz, to darjo uro ʙa sohil ʙijafkanad [va] dusmani Man va dusmani u onro [az oʙ] ʙigirad; va ʙar tu az coniʙi xes muhre [dar dilho] afkandam va [himojatat kardam] tahti nazar parvaris joʙi

20|40|On goh ki xoharat [dar kanori rud hamroh ʙo sanduqi tu] roh meraft va [ʙa kasone, ki turo az oʙ giriftand] guft: «Mexohed saxsero nisonaton diham, ki sarparastii uro ʙa uhda ʙigirad?» Pas, turo ʙa modarat ʙozgardonidem, to casmas [ʙa didorat] ravsan gardad va anduhgin naʙosad; va [ʙa'dho] tu saxse [qiʙti]-ro kusti va Mo az anduh [va mucozoti qatl] nacotat dodem va turo ʙorho ozmudem. Pas [az on] cand sol ʙajni mardumi Madjan ʙa sar ʙurdi; on goh, ej Muso, ʙar [tiʙqi] taqdiri [ilohi va dar zamoni muqarrar ʙa in co] omadi
20|41|Va turo ʙaroi xudam ʙarguzidam [to pajomamro ʙa mardum ʙirasoni]
20|42|[Inak] Tu va ʙarodarat ʙo nisonahoi [qudratu jagonagii] Man ravona saved va dar [da'vati haq va] jod kardani Man susti navarzed
20|43|Ba suji Fir'avn ʙiraved, ki u [kufr varzida va] sarkasi kardaast
20|44|Pas, ʙa narmi ʙo u suxan ʙigued; ʙosad, ki pand girad jo [az azoʙi ilohi] ʙitarsad [va tavʙa kunad]
20|45|[Muso va Horun] guftand: «Parvardigoro, mo ʙimnokem, ki ʙar mo pesdasti namojad [va pes az pojoni da'vat mucozotamon kunad] jo [dar ʙaroʙari suxani haq] sarkasi kunad»
20|46|[Alloh taolo] farmud: «Natarsed [ki] jaqinan, Man hamrohaton hastam [va hama cizro] mesunavam va meʙinam

20|47|Pas, ʙa sui u ʙiraved va ʙigued: «Mo firistodagoni Parvardigorat hastem. Bani Isroilro hamrohi mo ʙifirist va [tahqiru] ozorason nakun. Ba rosti, ki Mo ʙaroi tu az coniʙi Parvardigorat nisonahoi ravsane ovardaem; va salomati [az azoʙi ilohi] ʙar kasest, ki az hidojat pajravi kunad
20|48|Dar haqiqat, ʙa mo vahj sudaast, ki azoʙi [duzax] ʙar kasest, ki [ojot va mu'cizotro] duruƣ angost va [az da'vati pajomʙaras] ruj gardond»
20|49|[Fir'avn] Guft: «Ej Muso, Parvardigori sumo kist?»
20|50|[Muso] guft: «Parvardigori mo kasest, ki ʙa har cize ofarinisi [zohir va viƶagihoi munosiʙi] uro ʙaxsida va sipas [onro] hidojat namudaast»
20|51|[Fir'avn] Guft: «Pas, hol [va sarnavisti naslhoi guzasta [ki kofir ʙudaand] cist?»
20|52|[Muso] Guft: «Donisi on dar kitoʙe [Lavhi Mahfuz] nazdi Parvardigori man [saʙt] ast. Parvardigoram na istiʙoh mekunad va na faromus menamojad

20|53|On [ma'ʙude], ki zaminro ʙarojaton [hamcun] gahvorae [mahalli osois] qaror dod va dar on rohhoe ecod kard va az osmon oʙe furu firistod va ʙa vasilai on anvoi gunoguni gijohonro [az zamin] ʙerun ovardem
20|54|[Ham xud az on] Bixured va [ham] cahorpojonatonro ʙicaroned. Be tardid, dar in [umur] ʙaroi xiradmandon nisonahoe [az qudrati ilohi] ast
20|55|Sumoro az on [xok] ofaridem va ʙa on ʙozmegardonem va ʙori digar [dar qijomat] az on ʙerun meovarem
20|56|Va ʙa rosti, [Mo] hamai nisonahoi [qudrati] xudro ʙa u nison dodem; vale [hamaro] duruƣ pindost va [da'vati haqro] napaziruft
20|57|[On goh] Guft: «Ej Muso, ojo nazdi mo omadi, ki ʙo codujat moro az sarzaminamon ʙerun kuni
20|58|Pas, jaqinan, mo niz codue monandi on ʙarojat meovarem; pas, dar makone, ki [fosilaas az har du taraf] jakson ʙosad, va'dagohe mijoni Mo va xud ta'jin kun, ki na Mo az on xilof kunem va na tu
20|59|[Muso] guft: «Va'dagohi sumo ruzi id ʙosad, ki [hamai] mardum pes az zuhr cam' mesavand»
20|60|On goh Fir'avn ʙozgast va [tamomi] najrangu hilai xesro cam' kard va [hamrohi codugaronas ʙa mahalli mavridi nazar] omad
20|61|Muso ʙa onon guft: «Voj ʙar sumo! Bar Alloh taolo duruƣ naʙanded, ki ʙo azoʙe [saxt] noʙudaton mesozad; va jaqinan, har ki [ʙo fireʙ dodani mardum ʙar Alloh taolo] duruƣ ʙast, zijonkor gast»
20|62|Pas, [codugaron pas az husdori Muso] dar korason mijoni xud ixtilof kardand va pinhoni guftugu kardand
20|63|[Barxe az onon] Guftand: «In du [nafar] hatman, codugarand [va] ʙo codui xes mexohand sumoro az sarzaminaton ʙerun kunand va oin [va rohu rasm]-i ʙartari sumoro az mijon ʙardorand
20|64|Pas, [hamai] najrangi xesro faroham kuned [va ʙa kor ʙanded]; sipas dar jak saf [ʙaroi muʙoriza] ʙa pes oed. Be tardid, har ki imruz [ʙar dusman] cira savad, piruz [va komjoʙ] gastaast
20|65|[Codugaron] guftand: «Ej Muso, ojo tu [on ciro ʙo xud dori] meafkani jo [mo] naxustin kase ʙosem, ki meafkanad?»
20|66|[Muso] Guft: «[Na] ʙalki sumo ʙijafkaned». Pas, nogoh resmonho va cuʙdasthoi onon az codujason cunon ʙa nazaras rasid, ki gui ʙa sitoʙ mexazand
20|67|Pas, Muso dar dilas tarse ehsos kard
20|68|Guftem: «Natars, [ki] tu, hatman, [piruz va] ʙartari

20|69|Va on ciro, ki dar dasti rosti xud dori, ʙijafkan, to [tamomi] on ciro, ki soxtaand, ʙiʙal'ad. Be tardid, on ci onon soxtaand, faqat najrangi codugar ast va codugar har co, ki ʙosad [va har ci kunad], piruz namegardad»
20|70|[Pas, cun Muso asojasro ʙar zamin andoxt, ʙa mori ʙuzurge taʙdil sud va soxtahoi ononro ʙal'id], on goh codugaron ʙa sacda aftodand [va] guftand: «Ba Parvardigori Horun va Muso imon ovardem»

20|71|[Fir'avn] Guft: «Ojo pes az on ki ʙa sumo icozat diham ʙa u imon ovarded? Hatman, u ʙuzurgi sumost, ki ʙa sumo codugari omuxtaast. Pas, hatman, dastu poji sumoro ʙar aksi jakdigar [az capu rost] qat' mekunam va hamagiatonro dar tanahoi naxl ʙa dor meovezam va on goh xuʙ xohed donist, ki azoʙ [va sikancai] kadom jaki az mo saxttar va pojandatar ast; [man jo Parvardigori Muso]»

20|72|[Codugaron] Guftand: «Hargiz [pajravi az] turo ʙar in daloili ravsane, ki ʙarojamon omadaast va [hamcunin] ʙar on ki moro ofaridaast, tarceh namedihem; pas, ʙa har hukme, ki mexohi, hukm kun. Tu faqat metavoni dar zindagii in dunjo hukm kuni
20|73|Be tardid, mo ʙa Parvardigoramon imon ovardem, to gunohonamon va on ciro az codugari ʙar mo tahmil kardai, ʙiʙaxsojad; va Alloh taolo ʙehtaru pojandatar ast»
20|74|Har ki dar pesgohi Parvardigoras gunahkor hozir savad, jaqinan, otasi duzax ʙaroi ust; dar on co na memirad [ ki rahoi joʙad] va na [ʙa xusi] zindagi mekunad
20|75|Va har ki mu'min nazdi u ʙijojad, dar hole ki korhoi soista ancom doda ʙosad, pas, inon daracoti oli dorand
20|76|Boƣhoi covidoni [ʙihist], ki cujʙorho zeri [daraxtoni] on cori ast. Hamesa dar on xohand ʙud; va in ast podosi kase, ki xudro [az oludagihoi sirku gunoh] pok kardaast

20|77|Va ʙa rosti, [Mo] ʙa Muso vahj kardem, ki: «Bandagonamro saʙona [az Misr ʙerun] ʙiʙar, sipas ʙaroi onon dar darjo rohe xusk ʙikso, ki na az ta'qiʙ [-i dusmanon] xohi tarsid va na [az ƣarq sudan dar darjo] ʙim dori
20|78|On goh Fir'avn ʙo sipohijonas ononro dunʙol kard va oʙi darjo esonro furu pusonid; cunon pusonidane [ki haqiqatasro kase cuz Alloh taolo namedonad]
20|79|Va [ʙad-in son Fir'avn qavmi xudro gumroh namud va hidojat nakard]

20|80|Ej Bani Isroil, ʙa rosti, [Mo] sumoro az [cangi] dusmanonaton nacot dodem va dar samti rosti [kuhi] Tur ʙo sumo va'da guzostem [to Tavrotro nozil kunem] va ʙar sumo mann [sirini] va salvo [ʙedona] furu firistodem
20|81|Az ne'mathoi pokizae, ki ʙa sumo ruzi dodaem, ʙixured va dar on zijodaravi nakuned, ki xasmi Man ʙar sumo furud meojad; va har ki xasmi man ʙar u furud ojad, hatman, halok megardad
20|82|Va jaqinan, man omurzandai kase hastam, ki tavʙa kunad va imon ovarad va kore soista kunad va on goh ʙar hidojat [-i xud ʙoqi] ʙimonad
20|83|Ej Muso, ci ciz muciʙ sud, ki cilavtar az qavmat [ʙa suji va'dagohi Tur] ʙisitoʙi
20|84|[Muso] Guft: «Parvardigoro, onon ʙa dunʙolam meojand va man ʙa sujat sitoftam, to [az man] xusnud gardi»
20|85|[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Pas, [ʙidon, ki] Mo qavmatro pas az [raftani] tu ozmudem va Somiri gumrohason kard»

20|86|Pas, Muso xasmgin [va] anduhnok ʙa suji qavmas ʙozgast [va] guft: «Ej qavmi man, magar Parvardigoraton [dar ʙorai nuzuli Tavrot] va'dai naku ʙa sumo nadoda ʙud? Ojo ʙar pajmoni sumo [ʙo Alloh taolo] zamone tuloni guzast [va hamaro az jod ʙurded] jo xosted, xasme az [sui] Parvardigoraton ʙar sumo furud ojad, ki va'dai maro xilof karded?»

20|87|Onon guftand: «[Mo] Ba ixtijori xud pajmoni turo nasikastem, vale ʙorhoi sangine az zaru zevarhoi qavm [-i Fir'avn]-ro, ki ʙar mo nihoda ʙudand, [dar otas] andoxtem va Somiri niz [on ciro, ki iddao mekard, xoki sumi asʙi Caʙrail ast, dar otas] andoxt»

20|88|On goh ʙarojason mucassamai gusolae soxt, ki sadoe [hamcun sadoi gusola] dost. Pas, [Somiri va pajravonas ʙa mardum] guftand: «In ma'ʙudi sumo va ma'ʙudi Muso ast, ki onro faromus [va in co raho] kardaast»
20|89|Ojo namedidand, ki [in gusola] hec posuxe ʙa onho namedihad va hec zijone va sude ʙarojason nadorad

20|90|Va dar haqiqat, pes az on [ki Muso ʙozgardad] Horun niz ʙa onho gufta ʙud: «Ej qavmi man, cuz in nest, ki sumo ʙo in gusola imtihon sudaed va ʙe tardid, Parvardigori [haqiqii] sumo [Allohi] Rahmon ast; pas, pajravi man ʙosed va az farmonam itoat kuned»
20|91|[Onon] Guftand: «Mo pajvasta ʙar in [gusolaparasti] memonem, to Muso nazdamon ʙozgardad»
20|92|[Vaqte Muso ʙozomad] Guft: «Ej Horun, hangome ki didi onon gumroh sudaand
20|93|ci cize turo az pajravii man ʙozdost [va caro ononro tark nakardi]? Ojo az farmonam sarpeci kardi?»
20|94|[Horun] Guft: «Ej pisari modaram, risu [muji] saramro nagir. Dar haqiqat, tarsidam, ki ʙigui, mijoni Bani Isroil tafriqa andoxti va suxan [va suporis]-i maro ʙa kor naʙasti»
20|95|[Muso] Guft: «Ej Somiri, in ci kore ast, ki kardi?»
20|96|U guft: «Man cizero didam, ki onon nadidand va muste az xoki poji [asʙi] firistoda [Caʙrail]-ro ʙardostam va [dar pajkari gusola] andoxtam va [havoi] nafsam [in korro] incunin ʙarojam orost»

20|97|[Muso] Guft: «Pas, ʙirav. Be tardid, ʙahrai tu dar zindagi in ast, ki [cunon matrud savi, ki ʙa mardum] ʙigui: «[Ba man] Dast nazaned»; va va'dagohe [ʙaroi azoʙ] xohi dost, ki hargiz az on taxalluf naxohad sud; va [aknun] ʙa on ma'ʙude, ki pajvasta dar iʙodatas ʙudi, ʙingar; onro mesuzonem, on goh [ki komilan xokistar sud,] dar darjo parokandaas mesozem»
20|98|[Ej mardum] Ma'ʙudi sumo Alloh taolo ast, ki hec ma'ʙude [ʙar haq] cuz U nest va ilmas hama cizro faro giriftaast
20|99|[Ej Pajomʙar] In guna az axʙor [va dostonhoi pajomʙaroni] guzasta ʙar tu hikojat mekunem; va ʙa rosti, ki [mo] az coniʙi xes ʙa tu Qur'one [pandomuz] dodaem
20|100|Har ki az on rujgardon savad, jaqinan, ruzi qijomat ʙori sangine [az gunoh] ʙar dus xohad kasid
20|101|Covidona dar on [azoʙ] xohand mond; va ci ʙad ast ʙore, ki [kofiron] dar qijomat xohand kasid
20|102|Ruze, ki dar «sur» damida mesavad va dar on ruz mucrimonro [ki ʙisjor tarsidaand, ʙo casmu ʙadani] kaʙud cam' mekunem
20|103|Bajni xud ohista suxan megujand: «[Sumo] Bes az dah ruz [dar dunjo] ʙa sar naʙurdaed»
20|104|Mo ʙa on ci eson megujand, donotarem; on goh ki xiradmandtarinason megujad: «[Sumo] Tanho jak ruz ʙa sar ʙurdaed»
20|105|Va [ej pajomʙar] az tu dar ʙorai kuhho [dar qijomat] mepursand; pas, ʙigu: «Parvardigoram ononro saxt mutalosi [va parokanda] mekunad
20|106|Va onhoro sofu hamvor xohad namud
20|107|[Hamcun zamine] Ki dar on hec pasti va ʙalandi nameʙini»
20|108|Dar on ruz [hamai mardum] ʙiduni hec muxolifate az da'vatkunanda [-i ilohi] pajravi mekunand va sadoho dar ʙaroʙari Xudoi mehruʙon past mesavand va az hec ciz cuz sadoi poje naxohi sunid
20|109|Dar on ruz safoat sud nadihad, magar onro, ki Xudoi Rahmon ʙa u icozat dihad va suxanasro ʙipisandad
20|110|[Alloh taolo] On ciro, ki insonho [dar oxirat] dar pes dorand va on ciro, ki [dar dunjo] pusti sar guzostaand, [hamaro] medonad, vale donisi onon uro faro namegirad
20|111|Va cehraho dar ʙaroʙari [Parvardigori] zindai pojdor xor megardad va har ki [ʙori] sitam ʙardost, zijon did
20|112|Va kase, ki az korhoi soista ancom dihad va mu'min ʙosad, na az hec sitame meharosad va na az kostan [-i podosas]
20|113|Va, incunin, onro Qur'one [ʙa zaʙoni] araʙi nozil kardem va husdorhoi gunogun dar on ʙajon namudem; ʙosad, ki [az azoʙi ilohi] parhezand jo [in kitoʙ] ʙarojason pande padid ovarad
20|114|Pas, ʙalandmartaʙa ast Alloh taolo, ki farmonravoi haq ast. Va dar [xondani] Qur'on – pes az on ki vahji on ʙar tu pojon joʙad – sitoʙ makun; va ʙigu: «Parvardigoro, ʙar donisam ʙijafzo»
20|115|Ba rosti, pes az in ʙo Odam pajmon ʙastem [ki az mevai daraxti mamnua naxurad]; vale [pajmonasro] faromus kard va dar u azme [ustuvor] najoftem
20|116|Va [jod kun az hangome ki ʙa faristagon guftem: «Baroi Odam sacda kuned»; pas, [hamagi] sacda kardand, magar Iʙlis, ki sarpeci namud
20|117|Pas, guftem: «Ej Odam, in [Iʙlis] dusmani tu va hamsari tust; maʙodo sumoro az ʙihist ʙerun kunad, ki ʙa saxti meafti
20|118|Dar haqiqat, tu in [ne'mat]-ro [dar ʙihist] dori, ki na gurusna mesavi va na ʙarahna memoni
20|119|Va in ki dar on co na tasna mesavi va na oftoʙzada
20|120|Pas, sajton uro vasvasa kard [va] guft: «Ej Odam, ojo [mexohi] daraxti covidonagi va farmonravoii fanonopazirro nisonat diham?»

20|121|On goh az on [daraxti mamnua] xurdand va sarmgohason ʙar onon namojon sud va suru' kardand ʙa qaror dodani ʙargi [daraxtoni] ʙihist ʙar xud [to avratasonro ʙipusonand]; va [incunin ʙud, ki] Odam az Parvardigoras sarpeci kard va ʙa ʙerohi raft
20|122|Sipas Parvardigoras uro ʙarguzid va tavʙaasro paziruft va hidojatas kard

20|123|Farmud: «[Sumo du tan xamrohi Iʙlis] Hamagi az ʙihist furud oed, dar hole ki dusmani jakdigared. Agar az [coniʙi] man rahnamude ʙarojaton rasid, [ʙidoned] har ki az hidojatam pajravi kunad, na gumroh mesavad va na [az azoʙi duzax] ʙa ranc meaftad
20|124|Va kase, ki az jodi Man rujgardon savad, jaqinan zindagii saxte xohad dost va ruzi qijomat uro noʙino ʙarmeangezem
20|125|Vaj megujad: «Parvardigoro, caro maro noʙino ʙarangexti; hol on ki [dar dunjo] ʙino ʙudam?»
20|126|[Alloh taolo] Mefarmojad: «Hamon tavr, ki ojoti Mo ʙar tu omad va onhoro ʙa faromusi supurdi, imruz tu [niz] ʙa hamon surat faromus mesavi»
20|127|Va kasero, ki [dar gumrohi va gunoh] zijodaravi kunad va ʙa ojoti Parvardigoras imon naovarad, in guna kajfar medihem; va hatman, azoʙi oxirat sadidtar va pojdortar ast

20|128|Ojo ʙaroi hidojatason kofi nest, ki [ʙidonand] ci naslhoero pes az onon noʙud kardem, ki [aknun in musrikon] dar xonahoi eson [naslhoi guzasta] roh meravand? Ba rosti, dar in [nukta] ʙaroi xiradmandon nisonahoe [iʙratangez] ast
20|129|Va agar az suji Parvardigorat suxane [dar ʙorai itmomi huccat ʙo mardum] naguzasta ʙud va zamoni muajjane dar kor naʙud, hatman [azoʙi ilohi dar hamin dunjo ʙar onon] lozim mesud

20|130|Pas [ej Pajomʙar,] ʙar on ci megujand, sikeʙo ʙos va Parvardigoratro pes az tului oftoʙ [dar namozi ʙomdod] va pes az ƣuruʙ [dar namozi asr] ʙa poki sitois kun va soate az saʙ [dar namozi xuftan] va kanorahoi ruz [dar namozi pesin va som niz ʙa nijois ʙipardoz]; ʙosad, ki [az podosi ilohi] xusnud savi

20|131|Va hargiz ʙa [ne'mathoi dunjavi va] on ci ki guruhhoe az onon [musrikon]-ro az onho ʙahramand soxtaem, casm naduz. Inho zinati zindagii dunjost, to ononro ʙad-on ʙiozmojad; va ruzii Parvardigorat ʙehtar va pojdortar ast
20|132|Va xonavodaatro ʙa namoz farmon ʙideh va [xud] ʙar [ancomi] on sikeʙo ʙos [Mo] Az tu ruzi namexohem, [ʙalki] xud ʙa tu ruzi medihem; va sarancomi nek ʙaroi [ahli] parhez ast
20|133|[Musrikon] guftand: «Caro [Muhammad] mu'cizae az coniʙi Parvardigoras ʙaroi mo nameovarad?» Bigu: «Ojo [Qur'on ʙa unvoni] daleli ravsan on ci dar kitoʙhoi pesin ast, ʙarojason najomadaast?»

20|134|Agar Mo ononro pes az on [ki pajomʙar va kitoʙi osmoni ʙijojad] ʙo azoʙe halok mekardem, hatman, [ruzi qijomat musrikon] meguftand: «Parvardigoro, caro pajomʙare ʙa sujamon nafiristodi, to pes az on ki xoru rasvo savem, az ojoti Tu pajravi kunem?»
20|135|[Ej Pajomʙar, ʙa onon] Bigu: «Hama muntazirand; pas, sumo [niz] muntazir ʙosed. Ba zudi xohed donist, ki rahravoni rohi rost ci kasone hastand va hidojatjofta kist»
